Posts.Content: Sep 30, 2007 04:06PM bobdolly wrote: I had my lumpectomy in 2000 no nodes showed cancer.  Then in 2004 found mets to liver by blood tests.  Best of luck with your decision.  Hugs and prays Linda (alias bobdolly)
Posts.Title: How many have had recurrence after lumpectomy? kidsmom ozzie2

Posts.Content: Dec 12, 2007 07:23PM bobdolly wrote: Thanks everyone for your comments.  They will do my surgery with an abdominal incision and will find out if the mass is anything afterwards.  I appreciate your prayers and hugs and will let you know how it goes. Linda (bobdolly)
Posts.Title: mass by ovary bobdolly bobdolly

Posts.Content: bobdolly wrote: Well after a ct scan, pet scan, and ultrasound the doctors can only say I have a mass by my right ovary.  Since it is growing it has to come out so rather than do a bio then surgury I opted for a complete hystorectomy since I am 52 and not of child bearing age any longer.  Anyone had surgury after being on chemo for sometime?  I have been on various chemos for liver mets since 2004.  Any advice on what to expect on a recovery timeline for the hystorectomy> Linda (bobdolly) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: mass by ovary bobdolly bobdolly

Posts.Content: Oct 18, 2007 04:20PM bobdolly wrote: I was dx with mets to the liver in March of 2004 and have been on chemo since then.  I have gone through just about every kind of chemo there is. Right now I am taking Xeloda and Tykerb and will have a scan Monday to see if the cancer is at least stable.  I know how you feel.  It gets very old feeling crappy, losing your hair (3 times now), having your feet and hands hurt and just knowing that you have cancer.  I am sending you a big hug, hang in there. Linda (alias bobdolly)
Posts.Title: Pepsi716 LuAnnH pepsi716

Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2007 02:42PM bobdolly wrote: I think I have tried everything out there.  Dx with liver mets in 2004 Did Gemzar until it quit working, Abraxane didn't work for me at all, Herceptin and Xeloda until there was growth again, now Xeloda and Tykerb.  Kasey I saw you are on the same--any problem with diarrhea? Tracey remember there are always new drugs coming out and what didn't work for one might just be the ticket for you. Sending you a big hug Linda (alias bobdolly)
Posts.Title: thread on liver mets? Tracy1964 LuAnnH

Posts.Content: Nov 28, 2007 12:48PM bobdolly wrote: I have tried just about everything.  When I get the open sores on my feet I use nu skin--it really burns but seems to give the sores time to heal without the constant breaking back open.  Also use Vicks vapor rub at night with socks--really keeps feet moisturized. Linda (alias bobdolly)
